table.caption: Description of ephemeral storage encryption configuration options

tr.td: (StrOpt) The cipher and mode to be used to encrypt ephemeral storage. Which ciphers are available ciphers depends on kernel support. See /proc/crypto for the list of available options.
(IntOpt) The bit length of the encryption key to be used to encrypt ephemeral storage (in XTS mode only half of the bits are used for encryption key)
